title: java虚拟机创建失败
author: 幻.圣光
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-9-5 00:56 编辑 

Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.   Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.   Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx8000m   The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size
